title: RPG Character System - Methods and Properties
description: Add instance methods to RPG characters. Learn how to define methods in classes, use them to modify state, and implement game mechanics like attack, defend, heal, and leveling.

concepts.class_methods: Functions defined in a class that operate on instances
concepts.instance_methods: Methods that use 'this' to access and modify instance state
concepts.method_chaining: Calling methods in sequence for fluent API

learning_outcomes: Use 'this' to access and modify instance state
Implement game mechanics (attack, defend, heal, level up)
Create methods that return instance for chaining
